data.lyric:
[ti:One Margarita]
[ar:Luke Bryan]
[al:One Margarita]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]One Margarita - Luke Bryan
[00:03.59]Lyrics by：Michael Carter/Josh Thompson/Matt Dragstrem
[00:07.18]Composed by：Michael Carter/Josh Thompson/Matt Dragstrem
[00:10.78]Everybody here ain't from here
[00:13.12]But we're here doin' our thing
[00:15.87]Lettin' go a little little by little
[00:18.64]Sippin' on a frozen drink
[00:21.31]Tiki bars tik'n pourin' all weekend
[00:23.89]Clouds ain't leakin' no rain
[00:26.61]Two pieces a-shakin' white caps a-breakin'
[00:29.18]We ain't feelin' no pain it goes like
[00:31.90]One margarita two margarita three margarita shot
[00:37.00]Don't worry 'bout tomorrow
[00:38.51]Leave all your sorrow out here on the floatin' dock
[00:43.21]When that sun lays down we'll be on our way
[00:48.36]One more barefoot round one more last chance to say
[00:53.28]Hey Señorita don't you think we need a salt and a Buffett song
[00:58.55]One margarita two margarita three margarita
[01:02.62]We'll be gone
[01:09.24]Ice blue skies shades on the eyes
[01:11.67]To tuck the bloodshot away
[01:14.63]Hair of the dog shouldn't take long
[01:17.04]But who cares we got all day
[01:19.92]Palm trees a-leanin' sunburn a-screamin'
[01:22.47]But we'll all be alright after
[01:25.29]One margarita two margarita three margarita shot
[01:30.35]Don't worry 'bout tomorrow
[01:31.87]Leave all your sorrow out here on the floatin' dock
[01:36.42]When that sun lays down we'll be on our way
[01:41.71]One more barefoot round one more last chance to say
[01:46.57]Hey Señorita don't you think we need a salt and a Marley song
[01:51.80]One margarita two margarita three margarita
[01:56.04]We'll be gone
[02:01.51]We'll be gone
[02:08.04]Tiki bars tik'n pourin' all weekend
[02:10.53]Clouds ain't leakin' no rain
[02:13.27]Two pieces a-shakin' white caps a-breakin'
[02:15.85]We ain't feelin' no pain feelin' no pain
[02:20.39]It goes like
[02:21.19]One margarita two margarita three margarita shot
[02:26.37]Don't worry 'bout tomorrow
[02:27.86]Leave all your sorrow out here on the floatin' dock
[02:32.43]When that sun lays down we'll be on our way
[02:37.66]One more barefoot round one more last chance to say
[02:42.60]Hey Señorita don't you think we need a salt and a Chesney song
[02:47.75]One margarita two margarita three margarita
[02:52.15]We'll be gone
[02:57.31]We'll be gone
[03:02.69]We'll be gone
data.trans:
[ti:One Margarita]
[ar:Luke Bryan]
[al:One Margarita]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.59]//
[00:07.18]//
[00:10.78]这里的每个人都不是本地人
[00:13.12]但我们都在这里享受好时光
[00:15.87]一点一点 释放心中的压力
[00:18.64]品尝着冰冻的美酒
[00:21.31]风情酒吧 风情万种 周末时光 饮酒不休
[00:23.89]云朵飘浮 滴雨不落
[00:26.61]泳装姑娘 摇曳身体 白色帽子 遮挡阳光
[00:29.18]我们没有任何悲伤
[00:31.90]一杯玛格丽塔 两杯玛格丽塔 三杯玛格丽塔 喝
[00:37.00]别担心明天
[00:38.51]就让这大海的浪潮冲走你所有的悲伤
[00:43.21]太阳落山时 我们就启程
[00:48.36]光着脚 抓住最后的机会 勇敢地说
[00:53.28]嘿 姑娘 你不觉得我们应该共唱一曲悠扬的歌吗
[00:58.55]一杯玛格丽塔 两杯玛格丽塔 三杯玛格丽塔
[01:02.62]我们终究要离去
[01:09.24]冰蓝天空 戴着墨镜
[01:11.67]遮住充血的双眼
[01:14.63]来点醒酒液 应该很快就恢复
[01:17.04]但谁在乎呢 我们有一整天呢
[01:19.92]棕榈树随风摇曳 艳阳高高挂天上
[01:22.47]但我们都会好好的
[01:25.29]一杯玛格丽塔 两杯玛格丽塔 三杯玛格丽塔 喝
[01:30.35]别担心明天
[01:31.87]就让这大海的浪潮冲走你所有的悲伤
[01:36.42]太阳落山时 我们就启程
[01:41.71]光着脚 抓住最后的机会 勇敢地说
[01:46.57]嘿 姑娘 你不觉得我们应该共唱一首动听的歌吗
[01:51.80]一杯玛格丽塔 两杯玛格丽塔 三杯玛格丽塔
[01:56.04]我们终究要离去
[02:01.51]我们终究要离去
[02:08.04]风情酒吧 风情万种 周末时光 饮酒不休
[02:10.53]云朵飘浮 滴雨不落
[02:13.27]泳装姑娘 摇曳身体 白色帽子 遮挡阳光
[02:15.85]我们没有任何悲伤
[02:20.39]就像这样
[02:21.19]一杯玛格丽塔 两杯玛格丽塔 三杯玛格丽塔 喝
[02:26.37]别担心明天
[02:27.86]就让这大海的浪潮冲走你所有的悲伤
[02:32.43]太阳落山时 我们就启程
[02:37.66]光着脚 抓住最后的机会 勇敢地说
[02:42.60]嘿 姑娘 你不觉得我们应该共唱一首悦耳的歌吗
[02:47.75]一杯玛格丽塔 两杯玛格丽塔 三杯玛格丽塔
[02:52.15]我们终究要离去
[02:57.31]我们终究要离去
[03:02.69]我们终究要离去
